Description: Grey schist shallow bowl: with flat base and incurving rim. The interior of base is slightly countersunk.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Tomb of Qaa, tomb Q.21 subsidiary burial
Curator's comments: Bibliography: W. M. F. Petrie, 'Royal Tombs of the Earliest Dynasties' I, 28, pl.XXXVIII, 8; W. M. F. Petrie, 'Royal Tombs of the Earliest Dynasties' II, pl. LI B, 223.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1986 Jun-Oct, Carmarthen Museum, A son of Luxor's Sands 1990 Mar-Jun, Marseille, Musée de la Vieille Charite, L' Egypte des Millenaires Obscurs
